add-data-success: Your reading data has been added successfully.

confirmation.action-text: I understand the consequence, delete my goal
confirmation.subtitle: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your goal, and we'll stop tracking your progress.
confirmation.title: Are you sure?

delete-goal.success: Your reading goal has been deleted successfully.

edit-goal.subtitle: We will re-calculate your progress based on the new goal.
edit-goal.success: Your reading goal has been updated successfully.
edit-goal.title: Edit your reading goal

seconds-read-tooltip: This is the time you have spent reading the Ayahs you entered. We auto-populate it with the average reading speed on Quran.com, but you can override it with your actual reading time.
